title: Support Main (Aggressive Mage) | GOLD/PLAT | Serious 5's Flex CLIMB | Add Drydoor
body:
Add me: Drydoor.

I would prefer support, but I have spent a lot of time in every other role, especially ADC. Am happy to fill other roles as needed.

My duo partner would probably want in too, same rank as me, he usually plays ADC.

Thanks boi
